thread.title: Aaron James
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Aaron James

author: Aaron James
title: Aaron James
text: Honestly one of my favourite go-to services. Awesome custom-ability and good prices for what they make. I have ordered countless times from TShirt Studio and even recommended them to lots of my friends and family. Also had times when I have been contacted about certain designs and prints that I had requested that may have not been usable or clearly shown on the final product, and had excellent communication with the company. Very lovely people and great company!
